SEARCH
Package Control

Class InternshipControl

java.lang.Object
Control.InternshipControl
public class InternshipControl extends Object
Controls all internship opportunity operations in the system. Manages creation, approval, visibility, and filtering of internship opportunities. Company representatives can create up to 5 opportunities with maximum 10 slots each. Students can view and apply to internships based on their major and year of study. Career staff approve or reject internship opportunities before they become visible to students.

All CSV read and write operations use proper field escaping via ControlUtils.escapeCsvField(String) and ControlUtils.splitCsvLine(String) to handle special characters (commas, quotes, newlines) in internship titles, descriptions, company names, and preferred majors, ensuring data integrity across the application lifecycle. This prevents CSV injection and parsing errors when fields contain special characters.

Student major matching uses proper CSV parsing to support majors with commas and semicolons. Internship ID generation (e.g., #INT0001, #INT0002) uses proper CSV parsing to correctly identify the highest existing ID number, even when CSV fields contain special characters.

Version:
2.2
Author:
Allen

    • requestCreateInternshipOpportunity

      public String requestCreateInternshipOpportunity(String internshipTitle, String description, String internshipLevel, List<String> preferredMajors, String openDateStr, String closeDateStr, String numberOfSlotsStr)
      Request to create a new internship opportunity by a company representative. All text fields (title, description, company name) are properly escaped to handle special characters like commas and quotes.
      Parameters:
      internshipTitle - the title of the internship
      description - detailed description of the internship (can contain commas, quotes)
      internshipLevel - the level (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced)
      preferredMajors - list of preferred majors for applicants
      openDateStr - opening date in yyyy-MM-dd format
      closeDateStr - closing date in yyyy-MM-dd format
      numberOfSlotsStr - number of available slots (max 10)
      Returns:
      the auto-generated internship ID
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if user not logged in or max internships reached
      IllegalArgumentException - if number of slots exceeds 10

    • editInternshipOpportunity

      public void editInternshipOpportunity(String internshipID, String internshipTitle, String description, String internshipLevel, List<String> preferredMajors, String openDateStr, String closeDateStr, String numberOfSlotsStr)
      Edits an existing internship opportunity. Only allows editing if the opportunity status is "pending" (not yet approved by staff). Company rep can only edit their own internships. Validates dates (opening date must be valid, optional), slots (1-10), and majors (optional).
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the internship to edit
      internshipTitle - new title (required, non-empty)
      description - new description
      internshipLevel - new level (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced)
      preferredMajors - new preferred majors list (optional, can be empty)
      openDateStr - new opening date (yyyy-MM-dd format, optional)
      closeDateStr - new closing date (yyyy-MM-dd format, optional)
      numberOfSlotsStr - new number of slots (1-10, optional)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if not logged in or not a company rep
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found, not authorized, already approved, or invalid input

    • deleteInternshipOpportunity

      public void deleteInternshipOpportunity(String internshipID)
      Deletes an internship opportunity. Only allows deletion if the opportunity status is "pending" (not yet approved by staff). Similar to deleteApplicationsFromDB - reads all, filters out the deleted one, writes back clean CSV. Company rep can only delete their own internships.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the internship to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if not logged in or not a company rep
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found, not authorized, or already approved

    • deleteInternshipFromDB

      private void deleteInternshipFromDB(String internshipIDToDelete)
      Permanently deletes an internship from the database by reading all, filtering out the deleted one, and writing back. Ensures no blank rows are left in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      internshipIDToDelete - the internship ID to remove from database

      the parsed InternshipOpportunity or null if invalid

    • approveApplicationForInternship

      public String approveApplicationForInternship(String internshipID, int applicationNumber)

      internshipID - the ID of the internship
      applicationNumber - the application number to approve
      Returns:
      a message indicating the approval result
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if user is not logged in or internship is full
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship does not exist or user is not authorized

      Returns:

    • autoAssignInternshipID

      private String autoAssignInternshipID()
      Auto-generates a sequential internship ID in the format #INT0001, #INT0002, etc. Uses proper CSV parsing to handle fields with special characters, ensuring accurate ID extraction even when CSV contains commas, quotes, or other special characters in title, description, or other fields.
      Returns:
      the next available internship ID (e.g., "#INT0004" if highest existing is #INT0003)

      internshipID - the ID of the internship
      Returns:
      true if the student can apply, false otherwise

    • isInternshipOpen

      private boolean isInternshipOpen(String internshipID)
      Check if the internship is currently open based on opening and closing dates. Returns true if today's date is between opening date (inclusive) and closing date (inclusive).
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the ID of the internship opportunity
      Returns:
      true if the internship is open, false otherwise

    • getAvailableMajors

      public List<String> getAvailableMajors()
      Returns the list of all available majors from the system database. Used by the UI to populate major filter dropdowns.
      Returns:
      a list of all available major codes/names

    • getLoggedInStudentYear

      public Integer getLoggedInStudentYear()
      Returns the logged-in student's year of study (used for eligibility filtering). Year 3/4 students are eligible for Intermediate and Advanced internships, while Year 1/2 students can only apply to Basic level internships. Uses proper CSV parsing to handle fields with special characters.
      Returns:
      the student's year (1-4) or null if user is not a student or not found
